meanings.sent2: She gave an unvoiced nod of approval.
meanings.sent3: The unvoiced agreement between them was evident in their shared smile.
meanings.sent4: His unvoiced fears crept into his dreams at night.
meanings.sent5: The unvoiced tension in the room was palpable.

meanings.sent2: The unvoiced concerns of the group were finally addressed.
meanings.sent3: Their unvoiced frustrations bubbled under the surface.
meanings.sent4: The unvoiced emotions in his eyes spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: The unvoiced apology hung in the air between them.

meanings.definition: Lacking vocal cords or the ability to produce sound
meanings.sent2: The unvoiced bird flapped its wings in silence.
meanings.sent3: The unvoiced statue seemed to watch over the garden.
meanings.sent4: The unvoiced robot moved with mechanical precision.
meanings.sent5: The unvoiced ghost drifted through the walls without a sound.
